spec_data.Name: thunar-sendto-clamtk
spec_data.Description:
This is a simple extension to add virus scanning to Thunar
in the send-to menu.

ClamTk is a front-end for ClamAV.
It is meant to be lightweight and easy to use.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 30 Sep 2017 06:26:14 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Simple virus scanning extension for Thunar
